member.name: EMRCOLORCORRECTPALETTE
member.summary: The EMRCOLORCORRECTPALETTE structure contains members for the enhanced metafile record.

member.name: EMRCOLORCORRECTPALETTE.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRCOLORCORRECTPALETTE.ihPalette
member.summary: The index of the palette handle to color correct.

member.name: EMRCOLORCORRECTPALETTE.nFirstEntry
member.summary: The index of the first entry in the palette to color correct.

member.name: EMRCOLORCORRECTPALETTE.nPalEntries
member.summary: The number of palette entries to color correct.
